analyzed: 'pho ba'i chags pa las 'das pas mchod pa chen po chags pa che ste mchog tu mi 'gyur pa'i thabs kyis sems can gyi don yongs su mi gtong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: It is the great passion, because it is the great offering, since it transcends the passion of transmigration, and it is the supreme passion, because it is the means of not abandoning the welfare of sentient beings.

original: chags pa thams cad sel bar byed de 'gyur pa'i bde ba'i chags pa sel bar byed ces pa'i don to //
analyzed: chags pa thams cad sel bar byed de 'gyur pa'i bde ba'i chags pa sel bar byed ces pa'i don to //
translated: It is the remover of all passion, because it removes the passion of the bliss of transformation.

original: lhan cig skyes pa'i sku mngon par dga' ba mthar thug par gyur pa nyid kyis smin mtshams kyi chu skyes so //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa'i sku mngon par dga' ba mthar thug par gyur pa nyid kyis smin mtshams kyi chu skyes so //
translated: The place of the great passion is the lotus of the brow, because it is the ultimate delight of the body of innate joy.

original: @47b 'ga' zhig gi 'dod pas nor bu'i rtsa bar 'dod pa chen po'i sku'i dga' ba zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: @47b 'ga' zhig gi 'dod pas nor bu'i rtsa bar 'dod pa chen po'i sku'i dga' ba zhes pa'i don to //
translated: Some assert that it is the root of the jewel, because it is the joy of the body of great passion.

original: de nyid du de bzhin du lhan cig skyes pa'i gsung mngon par dga' ba nyid kyis bde ba che gsung gi dga' ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de nyid du de bzhin du lhan cig skyes pa'i gsung mngon par dga' ba nyid kyis bde ba che gsung gi dga' ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: In that place, the great bliss is the joy of speech, because it is the delight of the speech of innate joy.

original: de kho na nyid du lhan cig skyes pa'i thugs kyi mngon par dga' ba nyid kyis dga' ba chen po thugs kyi dga' ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de kho na nyid du lhan cig skyes pa'i thugs kyi mngon par dga' ba nyid kyis dga' ba chen po thugs kyi dga' ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The great joy of the mind is the joy of the mind called great joy, because of the delight of the innate wisdom in reality.

original: dga' ba chen po'i dga' ba 'di yin pas mgu ba che ste der de kho na bzhin du lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes mngon par dga' ba nyid kyis ye shes kyi dga' ba'o //
analyzed: dga' ba chen po'i dga' ba 'di yin pas mgu ba che ste der de kho na bzhin du lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes mngon par dga' ba nyid kyis ye shes kyi dga' ba'o //
translated: This is the great joy of joy, therefore it is the great delight, and there the joy of wisdom is the delight of the innate wisdom in reality.

original: 'dis sad pa'i gnas skabs bcom nas sprul ba'i sku'i dga' ba bzhi'i dbye bas bstan pa'o ;
analyzed: 'dis sad pa'i gnas skabs bcom nas sprul ba'i sku'i dga' ba bzhi'i dbye bas bstan pa'o ;
translated: This is taught by the division of the four joys of the emanation body, having conquered the state of waking.

original: / rnam par mi rtog bde ba che //
analyzed: / rnam par mi rtog bde ba che //
translated: Non-conceptual great bliss

original: 'dod pa'i mtshan nyid bdag nyid can //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i mtshan nyid bdag nyid can //
translated: is the nature of the characteristics of desire.

original: 'di ni dga' ba bde ba yi //
analyzed: 'di ni dga' ba bde ba yi //

original: khyim gyi sgo yi them pa 'dra //
analyzed: khyim gyi sgo yi them pa 'dra //

original: ae ma ho bde ba bde ba che //
analyzed: ae ma ho bde ba bde ba che //

original: ae ma ho ji ltar ji ltar bza' //
analyzed: ae ma ho ji ltar ji ltar bza' //

original: ji ltar 'dod pa mchog sems su //
analyzed: ji ltar 'dod pa mchog sems su //

original: dga' ba sna 'dren lta bu'o //
analyzed: dga' ba sna 'dren lta bu'o //

original: da ni mchog tu dga' ba'i dbye ba bstan par bya ste /
analyzed: da ni mchog tu dga' ba'i dbye ba bstan par bya ste /

original: de la gzugs che zhes pa snying ga'am /

analyzed: kha cig gi bzhed pas nor bu'i dbus su gzugs chen po bde ba yang dag pa'i rtog pa rgyas pa gang yin pa de de bzhin no //

analyzed: bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin nyid kyis khams gsum spyi'i khyab byed chos kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang gi ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: de nyid kyis na lus kyang che ba 'od gsal nyid kyis longs spyod rdzogs pa'i phyir sku'i mchog tu dga' ba'o //

analyzed: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i snang ba byed pa'i phyir kha dog che ba ste 'jig rten las 'das pa'i kha dog ces pa'i don to //

analyzed: rang bzhin gyi 'od gsal ba nyid kyis lus po che ste khyab bdag ces pa'i don to //

analyzed: 'di gnyis kyi gsung gi mchog dga' gsungs so //

analyzed: mchog tu gsang chen nyid kyi ming tsam las kyang 'das pa'i phyir ming yang che ba'o //

analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis brlabs byas phyir // rang bzhin med pa'i sbyor bdag nyid //

translated: Now, since the state of sleep has ended, the four divisions of the separation of joy are stated by the consecration of the nature of the dharmakƒÅya, which is the nature of the illusion-like, because of the great wisdom, which is the characteristic of the emptiness of the dharmadhƒÅtu.

analyzed: de bas na mchog ste lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba 'thob pa'i rgyu'i phyir ro //

analyzed: grags chen lhan cig skyes pa gzhom du med pa rgyas pa'i sgras 'gro ba sad par byed pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: tshig 'di dag gis ye shes kyi dga' bral yang dag par bstan to //

analyzed: rdo rje bla ma'i zhal nas ma rig pa'i gnyen po'i skad cig bde ba gang thob pa de nyid kyi grib ma ltar cung zad rjes su mthun pa'i bde ba'i dpes ji ltar ri mo'i thang sku me long gi nang du nye bar mtshon pa ltar de lta
translated: The vajra guru says: Whatever bliss is obtained is the antidote to ignorance. Like its shadow, a little bit of bliss is illustrated by the example of a painting on a wall reflected in a mirror.

original: de ltar yang /

analyzed: btsun mo'i ba ga bde chen du //
translated: In the bhaga of the queen,

translated: the so-called semen abides.üîΩAlso:

analyzed: yang / ae ma ho shes te ae @48b ma'o shes //

original: ae ma'o 'di dag gsal bar shes //
analyzed: ae ma'o 'di dag gsal bar shes //

original: 'di ni mchog tu 'bad pa'i sems //
analyzed: 'di ni mchog tu 'bad pa'i sems //

analyzed: dga' bral dga' ba tsam nyid do //

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //

analyzed: da ni bzhi pa'i gnas skabs bcom pas bde ba chen po'i skur gnas pa'i rang bzhin lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i dbye ba bzhi po gsungs pa ;
translated: Now, the four divisions of the innate joy which is the nature of abiding in the body of great bliss by destroying the state of the fourth are taught.

analyzed: / chags pa dang chags bral med pas chags pa chen po'i ngo bo sgyu 'phrul chen po ye shes kyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: The great illusion is the wisdom seal, the nature of great passion, because of the absence of passion and the absence of freedom from passion.

analyzed: brjod du med pa de de'i bdag nyid du 'dzin pas na sgyu 'phrul chen po 'chang ngo //
translated: The great illusion holder is the one who holds that inexpressible reality as his nature.

original: de nyid kyi phyir mkhas pa nor bu'i lte ba'i nang du mi 'pho ba'i bde ba rig pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir mkhas pa nor bu'i lte ba'i nang du mi 'pho ba'i bde ba rig pa'i phyir ro //
translated: For that very reason, the wise one is the one who knows the unchanging bliss within the navel cakra.

analyzed: 'dis sku'i lhan skyes kyi dga' ba gsal par byas so //
translated: This clarifies the innate joy of the body.

analyzed: sgyu 'phrul chen po phyag rgya chen po ste de'i 'phro bas 'gro ba'i don sgrub par byed pa'i phyir sgyu 'phrul chen po'i don sgrub pa'o //
translated: The great illusion is the great seal, and the great illusion accomplishment is the accomplishment of the benefit of beings by the emanation of that.

original: 'dis gsung gi lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba rab tu bstan to //
analyzed: 'dis gsung gi lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba rab tu bstan to //
translated: This clearly teaches the innate joy of speech.

analyzed: sgyu 'phrul chen po'i don bshad pa 'di nyid do //
translated: This is the explanation of the meaning of the Great Illusion.

analyzed: de'i dga' ba lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba nyams su myong ba'o //
translated: The experience of the bliss of the innate joy is the joy in that.

analyzed: 'dis ni thugs kyi lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba mtshon to //

analyzed: sgyu 'phrul chen po sangs rgyas kyi sgyu 'phrul mig 'phrul can mchog gi sgyu 'phrul can rlung nyi khri chig stong drug brgya po rnams mchog tu mi 'gyur pa nyid thob pas 'khor lo so sor sa gnyis gnyis so sor dmigs pa'i rim pas rdo rje nor bu'i
translated: The Great Illusion is the illusion of the buddhas, the supreme illusion of the supreme ones, the twenty-one thousand six hundred winds, which attain the state of supreme changelessness.

analyzed: rtse mo nas slar bzlog nas gtsug tor kyi  'khor lo'i lte bar gnas pa'i sgyu 'phrul chen po mig 'phrul can no //
translated: The Great Illusion, the supreme illusion, is the illusion that abides in the center of the wheel of the crown cakra, having been reversed from the tip of the vajra jewel.

analyzed: nor bu'i lte ba'i nang dang gtsug tor gyi gnas te gnas gnyis su gnas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It abides in two places, the center of the jewel and the place of the crown.

analyzed: 'di dag gis ni dga' ba bcu drug gi rang bzhin bcom ldan 'das rab tu bstan to //

analyzed: de ltar yang dri ma med pa'i 'od las / sprul pa yi ni sku gsung thugs //

analyzed: chags pa dang chags bral dang dbu ma'i chags pa las rgyal ba'i phyir rgyal ba'o //
translated: He is the Victor because he is victorious over attachment, non-attachment, and the middle, which is attachment.

original: ma rig pa la sogs pa rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis 'gog pas dgra rgyal lo //
analyzed: ma rig pa la sogs pa rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis 'gog pas dgra rgyal lo //
translated: He is the Victor over the enemy because he stops the twelve limbs of dependent origination, beginning with ignorance.

original: rdo rje nor bu'i rtse mor rnam par rtog pa'i rlung thams cad las rgyal ba'i phyir rnam par rgyal lo //
analyzed: rdo rje nor bu'i rtse mor rnam par rtog pa'i rlung thams cad las rgyal ba'i phyir rnam par rgyal lo //
translated: He is the Conqueror because he is victorious over all the conceptual winds at the tip of the vajra jewel.

original: bde ba chen po'i thig le'i tshul nyid kyis 'khor lo drug tu bsgyur pa'i ngang tshul gang gi yin pa de 'khor los sgyur pa ste /
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i thig le'i tshul nyid kyis 'khor lo drug tu bsgyur pa'i ngang tshul gang gi yin pa de 'khor los sgyur pa ste /
translated: He is the universal monarch because he is the one who turns the wheel in the six cakras by the method of the bindu of great bliss.

original: 'khor lo drug tu bsgyur pa zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: 'khor lo drug tu bsgyur pa zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúturning the wheel in the six cakras‚Äù is this.

original: yan lag bzhi pa dang yan lag drug gi stobs las rgyal ba'i phyir stobs po che'o //
analyzed: yan lag bzhi pa dang yan lag drug gi stobs las rgyal ba'i phyir stobs po che'o //
translated: He is the great powerful one because he is victorious over the power of the four branches and the power of the six branches.

original: tshogs kyi rtsa stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis la khyab pa'i bdag po nyid kyis mchog lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba khu ba'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: tshogs kyi rtsa stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis la khyab pa'i bdag po nyid kyis mchog lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba khu ba'i rang bzhin no //
translated: He is the supreme because he is the lord who pervades the seventy-two thousand channels with the essence of the connate joy, which is the seminal fluid.

original: dga' ba ngang mchog dga' dang dga' bral gyi tshogs kyi slob dpon lhan cig skyes pa'i gzugs brnyan nye bar ston par byed do //
analyzed: dga' ba ngang mchog dga' dang dga' bral gyi tshogs kyi slob dpon lhan cig skyes pa'i gzugs brnyan nye bar ston par byed do //
translated: The master of the assembly of the supreme joy of the innate joy and the joy of separation shows the image of the innate.

original: phung po lnga la sogs pa'i tshogs kyi lhan cig skyes pa'i tshul nyid bskyed pas mchog gi rje bo nyid kyi phyir tshogs rje'o //
analyzed: phung po lnga la sogs pa'i tshogs kyi lhan cig skyes pa'i tshul nyid bskyed pas mchog gi rje bo nyid kyi phyir tshogs rje'o //
translated: The lord of the assembly is the supreme lord because of generating the innate nature of the assembly of the five aggregates and so on.

original: tshogs sgyu ma lta bu'i sku de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rnams sam rang bzhin te de rnams kyi bdag po ste rje bo byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin gyi phyir 'od gsal lo //
analyzed: tshogs sgyu ma lta bu'i sku de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rnams sam rang bzhin te de rnams kyi bdag po ste rje bo byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin gyi phyir 'od gsal lo //
translated: The clear light is the lord of the assembly of the Tathagata's families or natures, which are the illusory body of the assembly, because it is the nature of the bodhisattva.

original: de nyid kyi phyir dbang dang ldan pa ste de dang ngo bo yang dag par mthong ba'i gzugs thams cad gsal ba'i phyir zhes so //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir dbang dang ldan pa ste de dang ngo bo yang dag par mthong ba'i gzugs thams cad gsal ba'i phyir zhes so //
translated: For that very reason, it is the powerful one, because all forms that are seen in its nature are clear.

original: mthu chen nus pa'am nyams su myong ba mi 'pho ba'i phyir gang yin pa de de bzhin no ;
analyzed: mthu chen nus pa'am nyams su myong ba mi 'pho ba'i phyir gang yin pa de de bzhin no ;
translated: The one with great power is just that because of the non-emission of power or experience.

original: / srog la sogs pa'i rlung rnams bde ba chen por thim par byed pa'i gces pa 'dzin pa'i phyir gces pa 'dzin pa ste'o //
analyzed: / srog la sogs pa'i rlung rnams bde ba chen por thim par byed pa'i gces pa 'dzin pa'i phyir gces pa 'dzin pa ste'o //
translated: It is the cherishing of the life-sustaining and other energies, because it causes them to dissolve into the great bliss.

original: tshul chen dmigs pa med cing snang ba med pa'i du ba la sogs pa'i snang ba gang gi yin pa de de bzhin no //
analyzed: tshul chen dmigs pa med cing snang ba med pa'i du ba la sogs pa'i snang ba gang gi yin pa de de bzhin no //
translated: It is the great method, because it is the method of the non-apprehension and non-perception of smoke and so on.

original: lhan cig skyes pa'i tshul nyid kyis blun po la sogs pas drang bar mi nus pa'i phyir gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog go //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa'i tshul nyid kyis blun po la sogs pas drang bar mi nus pa'i phyir gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog go //
translated: It is not dependent on another, because it cannot be led astray by fools and so on, by virtue of its innate nature.

original: tshig gi rje bo so sor sdud pa'i yan lag gsal bar gyur pas ma bcings pa'i tshig nyid kyis mchog sbyin pa la sogs pa nus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshig gi rje bo so sor sdud pa'i yan lag gsal bar gyur pas ma bcings pa'i tshig nyid kyis mchog sbyin pa la sogs pa nus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is the supreme gift of speech, because it is the clear manifestation of the branch of the withdrawal of speech, and because it is the power of speech that is not bound, by virtue of its ability to give the supreme gift and so on.

original: 'dis ni don so so yang dag par rig pa thob par gsungs so //
analyzed: 'dis ni don so so yang dag par rig pa thob par gsungs so //
translated: By this, the attainment of the correct discrimination of meaning is taught.

original: mi 'pho ba'i khu ba nyid kyis tshig @57b bdag ste gzhom du med pa'i sgra'i tshul nyid kyis tshig tu brjod pa spangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi 'pho ba'i khu ba nyid kyis tshig @57b bdag ste gzhom du med pa'i sgra'i tshul nyid kyis tshig tu brjod pa spangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is the speech of the self, because it is the unmoving semen, and it is the speech of the supreme, because it is the speech of the indestructible sound, by virtue of its abandonment of the expression of speech.

original: 'dis ni tshig so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa gsungs so //
analyzed: 'dis ni tshig so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa gsungs so //
translated: This is the attainment of the analytical knowledge of expression.

original: chos thams cad bdag med pa rab tu ston pa'i phyir smra mkhas pa'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad bdag med pa rab tu ston pa'i phyir smra mkhas pa'o //
translated: He is skilled in speech because he teaches the selflessness of all things.

original: 'dis ni chos so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa yang gsungs so //
analyzed: 'dis ni chos so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa yang gsungs so //
translated: This is the attainment of the analytical knowledge of the teaching.

original: rdo rje'i bzlas pa la sogs pas bde ba thob pas tshig la dbang ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje'i bzlas pa la sogs pas bde ba thob pas tshig la dbang ba'o //
translated: He has power over words because he has attained bliss through vajra repetition and so on.

original: 'dis ni spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa gsungs so //üîΩ'di ltar so so yang dag bar rig pa bzhi thob pa ngag tshig mtha' yas pa gang gi yin pa de tshig mtha' yas te /
analyzed: 'dis ni spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa gsungs so // 'di ltar so so yang dag bar rig pa bzhi thob pa ngag tshig mtha' yas pa gang gi yin pa de tshig mtha' yas te /
translated: This is the attainment of the analytical knowledge of ready speech.

original: sems can thams cad la skal ba ji lta bar rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i bdag nyid la sogs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sems can thams cad la skal ba ji lta bar rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i bdag nyid la sogs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar byed pa'i phyir ro //

original: kun rdzob kyi bden pa 'gog pa'i chos ston pa'i phyir tshig bden pa ste /
analyzed: kun rdzob kyi bden pa 'gog pa'i chos ston pa'i phyir tshig bden pa ste /
translated: He has true words because he teaches the Dharma that stops the truth of suffering.

original: kun rdzob kyi bden pa yang rang byin gyis brlabs pa sgyu ma lta bu'i lus te /
analyzed: kun rdzob kyi bden pa yang rang byin gyis brlabs pa sgyu ma lta bu'i lus te /

analyzed: de'i dag pa'i rgyu don dam pa'i bden pa 'od gsal la zhes bya'o //

analyzed: bden pa smra ba stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med pa rang gis rig par bya ba'i rab tu ston ba'i phyir ro //

analyzed: bden pa bzhi ni ston pa po lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba bzhi po nye bar ston pa'i phyir ro //

translated: He is irreversible, because he stops the four winds, which are the four hundred and twenty thousand, by abiding in the center of the four wheels. The meaning is that he has attained the stage of Immovable.

analyzed: phyir mi 'ong nyon mongs pa dbang du gyur pas 'khor ba ba min pa'i phyir ro //
translated: He is not a returner, because he is not in cyclic existence, being under the influence of the afflictions.

original: rang rgyal rtsa mtha' dag bde ba chen po'i tshul nyid du thob pa'i 'dren pa rang rgyal lo //
analyzed: rang rgyal rtsa mtha' dag bde ba chen po'i tshul nyid du thob pa'i 'dren pa rang rgyal lo //

original: bse ru ltar bse ru ste mi 'pho ba nyid kyis rtsa thams cad du 'pho ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bse ru ltar bse ru ste mi 'pho ba nyid kyis rtsa thams cad du 'pho ba'i phyir ro //

analyzed: de rnams su nges par bde ba chen po'i tshul nyid du byung bas na nges 'byung sna tshogs las byung ba'o //

original: 'byung ba chen po lnga bo rnams kyi rgyu byed pa gcig pa gnyis pa med pa ni 'byung ba chen po rgyu gcig pa'o //
analyzed: 'byung ba chen po lnga bo rnams kyi rgyu byed pa gcig pa gnyis pa med pa ni 'byung ba chen po rgyu gcig pa'o //
translated: The single cause of the five great elements is the single cause of the great elements.

original: de ltar yang /
analyzed: de ltar yang /
translated: Thus:

original: 'byung ba lnga po sa bon ni //
analyzed: 'byung ba lnga po sa bon ni //
translated: The seed of the five elements

analyzed: gzung ste rgyu rkyen tshogs pas skye //

translated: Thus,üîΩin the Shri-Heruka Tantra also,

translated: By the union of bola and kakkola,

translated: From the bodhicitta in the form of semen,

analyzed: bsrubs pa las ni me 'byung ste //

analyzed: zhes gsungs so //

analyzed: 'dod yon lnga la longs spyod kyang nyon mongs pa dang bral ba'i phyir dge slong ngo //

analyzed: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi dbang las rnam par rtog pa dang nyon mongs pa'i dgra mtha' dag bcom pas na dgra bcom pa ste byang chub kyi sems kyi sbyor bas bskyed pa'i dpe'i bde can brjod du med pa'i de kho na nyid kyi bde ba
translated: He is an arhat because he has conquered all the enemies of conceptual thought and the afflictions by the power of perfect complete enlightenment.

analyzed: nyid kyis don thams cad rdzogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: He is the one who has the bliss of the example of the bliss of the truth that is inexpressible, which is generated by the application of the mind of enlightenment, because all goals are accomplished by that alone.

analyzed: bla ma dam pa'i gdams ngag gis dbang bzhi pa'i skad cig la slob ma'i bzhi pa'i skad cig 'das pa nyid kyis skad cig de nyid la shin tu dad pa'i sbyor bas ma rig pa mtha' dag rab tu sbangs pa'i phyir zag pa zad pa gang gi'am gang
translated: By the guru's instructions, in the instant of the fourth initiation, the instant of the disciple's fourth initiation, in that instant, by the application of great faith, because all ignorance is completely burned, he is the one who has exhausted the defilements.

analyzed: las yin pa de de bzhin no //

analyzed: mi 'pho ba'i bde ba nyid kyis bde ba de nyams pa'i 'jigs pa med pa'i phyir 'jigs med thob po //
translated: It is the attainment of fearlessness because there is no fear of losing that bliss due to the immobility of bliss.

original: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i rtsi chen po dang ldan pa nyid kyis lus dang ngag dang sems kyi g-yeng ba'i me mtha' dag rab tu zhi ba'i phyir bsil bar gyur pa'o //

translated: It is the state of coolness because all the fires of distraction of body, speech, and mind are completely pacified due to possessing the great elixir of connate joy.üîΩIt is the state of non-disturbance because it is not disturbed by the elements, such as wind.

original: hi don 'di la chags pa dang chags bral la sogs pas ma gos pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: hi don 'di la chags pa dang chags bral la sogs pas ma gos pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is the state of non-turbidity because it is not turbid with attachment, anger, and so on.

original: rnyog pa med pa ye shes kyi sku'o //
analyzed: rnyog pa med pa ye shes kyi sku'o //
translated: The non-turbid is the j√±ƒÅnakƒÅya.

original: rig pa shes rab ye shes chen po'o //
analyzed: rig pa shes rab ye shes chen po'o //
translated: Awareness is the great pristine wisdom of discriminative insight.

original: @58b de'i rkang pa dbang bzhi par thim pa'o //
analyzed: @58b de'i rkang pa dbang bzhi par thim pa'o //
translated: Its feet dissolve into the fourth initiation.

original: de dang ldan pa de dang gnyis su med pa'i tshul zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: de dang ldan pa de dang gnyis su med pa'i tshul zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúendowed with that, in a manner of non-duality with that‚Äù is as follows.

analyzed: chags pa med pa'i bde ba las phul du byung ba las slar mi ldog pa'am ji srid rtogs par bya ba rtogs pas bde gshegs so //
translated: The Sugata is the one who does not turn back from the bliss that is beyond attachment, or who has realized the object of realization for as long as it lasts.

original: phung po dang khams dang skye mched la sogs pa'i tshul gyis 'jig rten bde ba chen po nyid du rig pa de ni de bzhin no //
analyzed: phung po dang khams dang skye mched la sogs pa'i tshul gyis 'jig rten bde ba chen po nyid du rig pa de ni de bzhin no //
translated: The world is the same as the great bliss, in the manner of the aggregates, elements, media, and so on.

original: mchog ni dga' ba dang mchog dga' dang dga' bral gyi mchog gi phyir mchog phul du byung ba'o //
analyzed: mchog ni dga' ba dang mchog dga' dang dga' bral gyi mchog gi phyir mchog phul du byung ba'o //
translated: It is supreme, because it is the supreme of the joys, the supreme joy, and the supreme separation from joy.

analyzed: bdag dang bdag gi ba la sogs par rtog pa rab tu nyams pa'i phyir bdag gir mi 'dzin pa ste de bzhin nyid kyi bdag nyid ces pa'i don to //
translated: It is not grasped as one‚Äôs own, because of the complete disappearance of the concepts of ‚ÄúI‚Äù and ‚Äúmine,‚Äù and so on. The meaning is that it is of the nature of reality.

analyzed: bdag gis bde ba la longs spyod do zhes bde bar nges pa'i ngar 'dzin pa dang bral ba'i phyir ngar 'dzin no //

translated: The supreme, which is the innate clear light, is the supreme great bliss, which is like a ray of light, because it is supreme in comparison to the light of the sun and so forth.

translated: The Dharma is the lord of the Dharma of the four innate joys, the lord of the three worlds, because of being the lord of the taste of the bodhicitta that is always present.

analyzed: chos bde ba chen po rin po che'i char gyis 'jig rten sgyur par byed pa'i phyir chos kyi rgyal po'o //

analyzed: legs pa'i lam bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i mtshan nyed kyis ston pa po gsal bar mdzad pa'o //

analyzed: don dam par chos thams cad ye shes kyi rnam par rab tu snang bar byed pa'i phyir grub pa rdzogs pa'o //
translated: The Dharma is the perfect accomplishment because it illuminates the appearance of all phenomena as wisdom in the ultimate.

original: nga las sam gang gi yin pa de de bzhin no //
analyzed: nga las sam gang gi yin pa de de bzhin no //
translated: The Dharma is the one who is so, or it is his.

analyzed: bsam pa gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa gang yin pa de de bzhin no //

analyzed: sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang bskyed pa bsgom pa sgoms pas 'grub pa ste /

original: rtag tu mngon du byas pa'o //
analyzed: rtag tu mngon du byas pa'o //

analyzed: de'i phyir kun du rtog pa thams cad bdag dang bdag gi bar 'dzin pa'i mngon par zhen pa spangs pa gsal ba'o //

translated: It is nonconceptual, because it performs everything with a nonconceptual mind for the sake of initiation, commitments, conduct, and so forth.

original: chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi phyir dbyings so //
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi phyir dbyings so //
translated: It is the realm, because it is the nature of all phenomena.

original: 'od gsal du nges pa nyid kyis zad pa med pa'i phyir mi zad pa'o //
analyzed: 'od gsal du nges pa nyid kyis zad pa med pa'i phyir mi zad pa'o //

analyzed: sku gsum gyi bdag nyid bde ba chen po'i tshul gcig gi phyir chos dbyings so //

original: rang 'byung lhan cig skyes pa nyid kyi phyir dam pa'o //
analyzed: rang 'byung lhan cig skyes pa nyid kyi phyir dam pa'o //
translated: It is supreme, because it is the innate self-originated.

analyzed: mi 'gyur pa'i phyir zad mi shes pa'o //

analyzed: 'dis ni rnam par mi rtog pa bsgom pa kho na phyag rgya chen po 'grub pa'i rgyu'o zhes bshad pa'o //

analyzed: de'i bdag nyid du de dang ldan pas na bsod nams ldan pa'o //

analyzed: de ltar yang /

analyzed: chags bral las gzhan sdig med de //

analyzed: bde ba las gzhan bsod nams med //

analyzed: de phyir 'bad pa thams cad kyis //

analyzed: 'pho ba'i bde ba rnam par spangs //

original: de yang brjod par mi rung ba'o //
analyzed: de yang brjod par mi rung ba'o //
translated: That also is not suitable to be expressed.

original: zhes so // rol pa'i rdo rjes kyang /
analyzed: zhes so // rol pa'i rdo rjes kyang /
translated: And Vilasyavajra says:

original: lhan skyes dga' ba bzhi pa'i skad cig la //
analyzed: lhan skyes dga' ba bzhi pa'i skad cig la //
translated: In the moment of the fourth innate joy,

original: rang gis yang dag rig pa shes par 'gyur //
analyzed: rang gis yang dag rig pa shes par 'gyur //
translated: one will know the self-cognizant gnosis.

original: zhes so // lus ngag yid gsum ni rang bzhin brgya drug cu'i gzhan dbang nyid kyis sdug bsngal gsum mo //
analyzed: zhes so // lus ngag yid gsum ni rang bzhin brgya drug cu'i gzhan dbang nyid kyis sdug bsngal gsum mo //
translated: The three‚Äîbody, speech, and mind‚Äîare the three sufferings due to being under the power of the one hundred and sixty natural instincts.

original: de rnams kyi sdug bsngal rang bzhin khong du ma chud pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi sdug bsngal rang bzhin khong du ma chud pa'o //
translated: Their suffering is not understood to be natural.

original: de thabs dang shes rab kyi ye shes kyi stobs kyis zhi bas zhi byed do //
analyzed: de thabs dang shes rab kyi ye shes kyi stobs kyis zhi bas zhi byed do //
translated: That is pacified by the power of the gnosis of method and wisdom, and so it is pacified.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gsum sel bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gsum sel bzhi pa'o //
translated: For that very reason, the fourth is the one that eliminates the three.

original: mtha' yas ni zung 'jug gi bzhon pa ste rnam par rtog pa'i rlung thams cad 'gags pas rab tu mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mtha' yas ni zung 'jug gi bzhon pa ste rnam par rtog pa'i rlung thams cad 'gags pas rab tu mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Infinite is the mount of union, because all conceptual winds are blocked and there is a nonabiding nirvana.

original: 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gsum las grol bar gyur pas na grol gsum thob pa ste /
analyzed: 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gsum las grol bar gyur pas na grol gsum thob pa ste /
translated: Since one is liberated from the three‚Äîattachment, anger, and ignorance‚Äîone obtains the three liberations.

original: sgrib pa kun las nges par grol bar yang ngo //
analyzed: sgrib pa kun las nges par grol bar yang ngo //
translated: And also definitely liberated from all obscurations.

original: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba nyid kyis mkha' ltar mnyam pa nyid la gnas //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba nyid kyis mkha' ltar mnyam pa nyid la gnas //
translated: Abiding in the equality of space, by means of natural luminosity.

original: sna tshogs gzugs mthong bas nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir nyon mongs dri ma kun las 'das pa'i phyir /
analyzed: sna tshogs gzugs mthong bas nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir nyon mongs dri ma kun las 'das pa'i phyir /
translated: Having seen the various forms, because of being free from all afflictions, because of being beyond all the stains of afflictions,

original: chos kyi dbyings mi zad pas 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / nga ltar byung ba'i dus gnas pa dang bral ba'i phyir dus gsum dus med rtog pa po /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings mi zad pas 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / nga ltar byung ba'i dus gnas pa dang bral ba'i phyir dus gsum dus med rtog pa po /
translated: The one who realizes the three times without time, because of abiding in the dharmadhatu that is free from past, future, and present.

original: rnam pa thams cad gnyis su med pa mthong ba'i phyir sems can kun gyi gtso bo chen po nyon mongs pa'i g-yul thams cad las rgyal ba nyid kyis ji snyed rtogs pa'i chos thob pa'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad gnyis su med pa mthong ba'i phyir sems can kun gyi gtso bo chen po nyon mongs pa'i g-yul thams cad las rgyal ba nyid kyis ji snyed rtogs pa'i chos thob pa'o //
translated: The great chief of all sentient beings, because of seeing all aspects as nondual. The one who has attained the Dharma of realization, because of being victorious over all the battles of afflictions.

original: yon tan thod ni nor bu'am sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das so //
analyzed: yon tan thod ni nor bu'am sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das so //
translated: The crest-jewel is the jewel or the Bhagavan Buddha.

original: de rnams kyi thod dpal lhan cig skyes pa'i thig le'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi thod dpal lhan cig skyes pa'i thig le'o //
translated: The crest of those is the glorious coemergent bindu.

original: chos dang nor dang 'dod pa dang thar pa'i rnam par rtog pas ma brtags pa'i phyir so sor sdud pa'i yan lag gsal ba'i dngos pos sha la sogs pa'i spyan gyis rnam pa thams cad stong pa nyid sna tshogs mthong ba'i phyir dang / gzhan sems can rnams stong pa nyid mthong ba'i don la dmus long nyid kyi phyir lus kun las ni rnam grol ba'o //
analyzed: chos dang nor dang 'dod pa dang thar pa'i rnam par rtog pas ma brtags pa'i phyir so sor sdud pa'i yan lag gsal ba'i dngos pos sha la sogs pa'i spyan gyis rnam pa thams cad stong pa nyid sna tshogs mthong ba'i phyir dang / gzhan sems can rnams stong pa nyid mthong ba'i don la dmus long nyid kyi phyir lus kun las ni rnam grol ba'o //
translated: Because it is not investigated by the concepts of Dharma, wealth, desire, and liberation, the limb of withdrawal is the clear entity. Because it sees the emptiness of all aspects and the variety with the eyes of flesh, etc., and because other sentient beings are blind to the meaning of seeing emptiness, it is completely liberated from the body.

original: de nyid kyi phyir nam @71b mkha'i lam stong pa nyid kyi gzugs su rab gnas pa rnams par rtog pa'i ngo bor rnam par gnas pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir nam @71b mkha'i lam stong pa nyid kyi gzugs su rab gnas pa rnams par rtog pa'i ngo bor rnam par gnas pa'o //
translated: Therefore, it is well-established in the form of emptiness, the path of space, and is well-established in the nature of conceptualization.

original: de ltar yang /
analyzed: de ltar yang /
translated: As it is said:

original: nam mkha' sgom pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa'o zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: nam mkha' sgom pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa'o zhes gsungs so //
translated: This meditation on space is the meditation on the perfection of wisdom.

original: yid bzhin nor bu chen po 'chang ban ni mngon par 'dod pa'i don thams cad grub pa ster ba'i phyir lhan cig skyes pa'i thig le 'chang ba ste lhan cig skyes pa rang bzhin med pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin zhes pa'i don
analyzed: yid bzhin nor bu chen po 'chang ban ni mngon par 'dod pa'i don thams cad grub pa ster ba'i phyir lhan cig skyes pa'i thig le 'chang ba ste lhan cig skyes pa rang bzhin med pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin zhes pa'i don
translated: He is the holder of the great wish-granting gem, because he bestows the accomplishment of all desired aims. He is the holder of the innate bindu, because he is the innate nature of the perfection of wisdom, which is the nature of non-existence.

original: to // de nyid kyi phyir khyab bdag ste khyab byed do //
analyzed: to // de nyid kyi phyir khyab bdag ste khyab byed do //
translated: For that very reason, he is the lord of pervasion, because he is the pervader.

original: lus ngag sems kyi thig le rin po che kun gyi mchog bla na med pa'i dga' ba ste rab po nyid kyi phyir ro ;
analyzed: lus ngag sems kyi thig le rin po che kun gyi mchog bla na med pa'i dga' ba ste rab po nyid kyi phyir ro ;
translated: He is the supreme joy, because he is the supreme of all precious bindus of body, speech, and mind.

original: /'jig rten las 'das pa mngon par 'dod pa'i don gyi dngos grub ster ba'i phyir dpag bsam shing chen te rgyas pa yang dag par rgyas pa'o //
analyzed: /'jig rten las 'das pa mngon par 'dod pa'i don gyi dngos grub ster ba'i phyir dpag bsam shing chen te rgyas pa yang dag par rgyas pa'o //
translated: He is the great wish-fulfilling tree, because he bestows the accomplishment of the supramundane desired aims. He is fully expanded, because he is expanded.

original: bum pa bzang po khyad par can gyi phyir bum pa bzang po che ba'i mchog go //
analyzed: bum pa bzang po khyad par can gyi phyir bum pa bzang po che ba'i mchog go //
translated: He is the excellent vase, the supreme greatness, because he is the special excellent vase.

original: lhun gyis grub pa ste sems can thams cad bde bar byed pa'i chos ston pa'i phyir byed pa'o //
analyzed: lhun gyis grub pa ste sems can thams cad bde bar byed pa'i chos ston pa'i phyir byed pa'o //
translated: It is spontaneous, because it teaches the Dharma to bring about the happiness of all sentient beings.

original: de nyid kyi phyir sems can kun don byed do //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir sems can kun don byed do //
translated: And for that very reason, it is the benefactor of all sentient beings.

original: phan pa sgrub cing bde ba ster ba'i dang tshul gang gi yin pa de phan 'dogs so //
analyzed: phan pa sgrub cing bde ba ster ba'i dang tshul gang gi yin pa de phan 'dogs so //
translated: It is the benefactor of those who are to be benefited, who are to be given happiness.

original: 'gro ba la bu gcig pa ltar byams pa'i phyir sems can mnyes gshin pa'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba la bu gcig pa ltar byams pa'i phyir sems can mnyes gshin pa'o //
translated: It is the friend of the spiritual life, because it loves sentient beings as if they were its only child.
